p: The adsorption term ( eq 5 ) makes use of a fixed total binding density of W 1,ads ( eq 2 ), a fixed bond order (β=0), and an adjustable binding constant ( K f). The condensation term ( eq 6 ) involves the condensable water density ( C μs), the condensation constant ( K μ), and the critical number of water molecules in a nanocluster needed to trigger condensation.
